::Hakibuscon::

            Hakibuscon put on his cloaking device and snuck=
 inside the Ark.  He went to the control room.  He was lucky, he had brough=
t an infiltration kit.  He didn't hack into the autoguns yet, he had to sco=
ut out the rest of the ship.  He eventually found Zergling and Punch fighti=
ng some other Maximals(I think they are inside.  Correct me if I'm wrong, a=
nd if they are inside the Ark, who is fighting them??).  Hakibuscon looked =
at the Ark, it couldn't die!!!  The Ark must live, even if it met double-cr=
ossing the Preds.  He was neutral, after all.  He went out of cloaking, and=
 fired a shot from his newly aquired plasma rifle at Zergling.

        "Ha=
ha, the Ark is NOT going down today!!!!" Hakibuscon said, firing 2 more pla=
sma shots at Zergling.
